content.rendered:
Monday, September 30, 2024 

Today is a “C” Day         

Club Meetings and Information 

  • The student council meeting is on Monday, September 30th in Mrs. Kerls room D178. 
     
  • The first yearbook club meeting will be held in room B105 on Monday, September 30th at 2:35. This club is open to students in grades 6-8. 
     
  • If you are a student who enjoys knitting or crochet, or someone who would like to learn how to knit, the Knitting Club is beginning afterschool on Monday, September 30th. Join us in Rm. 122 on Monday with Mrs. Levin. No supplies needed to join. Check the Canvas Clubs page for more information. 
     
  • Do you like singing? Then you should join voice club! It’s a super fun and no pressure way to learn about your singing voice. We have themed karaoke weeks and can help you choose and learn songs to sing as solos. It’s a great way to meet new people! You do not have to be in Chorus to join voice club- just come, sing, and have fun! 
     
  • Are you ready for it? Pop Culture Icon Club’s first meeting is after school on Wednesday, October 2, in the Large Group Room with Ms. Schnorr. Cannot wait to see you there! 
     
  • Chess Club will begin Wednesday, October 2 after dismissal. We will meet in room 210. See you then! 
     
  • The first meeting of the TV Studio Club will be this Wednesday after school in the library. If you’re interested in being on the morning announcements or helping to create the announcements, come see if this club is a good fit for you. Meet us in the library after school this Wednesday. See Mr. Todd or Mrs. Hubbs with any questions. 

 Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
